title: Mahakala
subject: Buddhist Center Düsseldorf
description: An image depicting warrior deities (Mahakala) on the laying body of demon with wearing crown of five skulls and long garland with demon heads holding fire bowl on the left and vajra on the right hand.

title: White Bhairab
subject: Buddhist Center Düsseldorf
description: A statue of warrior deity (White Bhairab) with wearing crown of five skulls and long garland with demon heads.

title: Sitatapatra
subject: Buddhist Center Düsseldorf
description: A sitting statue of Dukar or chatra Tara hold parasol(Umbralla) from right hand and lotus in other hand. Wearing long necklace, big earrings and crown.

title: Maitreya
subject: Buddhist Center Düsseldorf
description: A statue of seated Bodhisattva Maitreya on lotus base seat in dharmacakra mudrasana, wearing a royal garment, crown and necklace. The left side holds the stem of lotus with water pot (Kalasa) and on the right side dharma wheel symbol in lotus stem. Lower side with cloud decoration in both side.

title: Budhha Shakyamuni with two chief disciples
subject: Buddhist Center Düsseldorf
description: The painting of Shakyamuni Buddha in cross leg sitting position with bowl in lotus Asana with two disciples Sariputta in the right and Mogallana in the left on the below register Bhairab associated with other two protective deities in left and right

title: An arrangement of pictures in hall
subject: Buddhist Center Düsseldorf
description:
In the centre of hall, Upper register right side,Thaye Dorje,17th Gyalwa Karmapa, Middle The 16th Gyalwa Karmapa Rangjung Rigpe Dorje, Left Side:Lama Ole Nydahl Middle register top layer karmapa in center left vajra right bell with vajra handle, below layer, Tara, shakyamuni Buddha and Maitreya Boddhisattva 
left register right to left thangka of Milarepa, Karmapa and Kurukulle

title: The entrance gate ofJapanese cultural center
subject: Eko-haus der Japanischen Kultur e.V. Düsseldorf
description: A traditional main entrance gate of Japanese temple.

title: A view of Japanese temple
subject: Eko-haus der Japanischen Kultur e.V. Düsseldorf
description: A traditional Japanese temple, shine in upper height, big bell in front of shine hall, Japanese a pond with bridge Japanese architecture.

title: A crown Prince Shōtoku
subject: Eko-haus der Japanischen Kultur e.V. Düsseldorf
description: A standing statue of crown prince Shōtoku with holding a book in his hand with traditional Japanese attire.

title: Amitabha Buddha
subject: Eko-haus der Japanischen Kultur e.V. Düsseldorf
description: A depiction of standing Amitabha Buddha on a lotus with halo and radiant circle from body (Prabhamandal). The right hand in varada mudra and left hand down.

title: Jodo Shinshu
subject: Eko-haus der Japanischen Kultur e.V. Düsseldorf
description: Upper register Nagarjuna and Vasabandhu (India), middle register from China:T'an Luan (Donran) Tao ch'o(Doshaku) and Shan Tao(Zendo) lower register Japan:Genshin and Honen

title: Hōnen Shōnin
subject: Eko-haus der Japanischen Kultur e.V. Düsseldorf
description: A picture of sitting Hōnen on a mat with traditional Japanese monk attire,

title: A praying hall arrangement of zen center
subject: Eko-haus der Japanischen Kultur e.V. Düsseldorf
description: An arranged praying hall with stage along with sitting chair, displaying praying books and incense burning place. Traditional Japanese style.

title: The main entrance of gate of Wat Buddhasamakee
subject: Wat Buddhasamakkee Germany
description: An entrance door in the center Buddha Head with halo and both side with clouds

title: The emerald Buddha
subject: Wat Buddhasamakkee Germany
description: A statue of meditating Buddha made up with green emerald stone with crown and jewelries. The sitting position with cross leg and right palm on the top of left palm. (Samadhi Asana).

title: The auspious foot-print mark of Buddha
subject: Wat Buddhasamakkee Germany
description: A Panel depicting the auspicious footprint mark of Buddha with side by side decoration of bodhi tree leaves design frame.

title: Buddha Shakyamuni
subject: Wat Buddhasamakkee Germany
description: A statue of Sitting Buddha in meditation position with yellow cloth on the body.

title: Phra pratarnporn
subject: Wat Buddhasamakkee Germany
description: A statue of meditating Buddha made up with silver, the sitting position with cross leg and right palm on the top of left palm. (Samadhi Asana). Traditional art from Luang phor Pae with craving Asana with protective deities and lotus base.

title: Buddha
subject: Wat Buddhasamakkee Germany
description: An Image of sitting Buddha with ground touching posture with halo. Representing the moment of enlighten from Bodhagaya.

title: Buddha in different posture
subject: Wat Buddhasamakkee Germany
description: A representing different posture, Thai style Buddha. Left to right 1. A sitting Buddha with Mucalinda naga protected, a standing Buddha, a sitting Buddha, two standing Buddha, sleeping Buddha, walking Buddha, standing Buddha.

title: A traditional Thai setup of Buddha statues
subject: Wat Buddhasamakkee Germany
description: A setup of Thai Buddhist Buddha arrangements in worshiping hall, with huge sitting Buddha backside, middle Enlighten Buddha with halo representation Enlightenment for Buddhagaya, and in the front Thai style samdhi Buddha with high Asana. Both side decorative objects and front two candle and incense.
